About Lindybeige

Lindybeige is a channel that has existed since January 2008, and covers the interests of its creator, who read archaeology at university and the went on to be a research associate in evolutionary psychology. The topics include military history, particularly of the ancient and medieval periods and World War Two, rants, swing dance, travelogues, evolution, and occasional silly stuff.
